description:
Keep your everyday essentials close at hand in this one-of-a-kind waistpack. As part of Cotopaxi's Del Día collection, the Bataan is made with remnant materials and sewn by people who have creative control over its final look. That means that no two packs are alike.

  • Made with durable, lighweight ripstop nylon sourced from remnant fabrics
  • Zipppered main compartment has 2 internal mesh pockets to keep things findable
  • Adjustable webbing strap can be worn as a waistbelt or cross-body
  • Since each product is unique, the colours of the one you receive may differ from those in the image. Sorry, we can’t accommodate specific colour requests (embrace the uncertainty)
name: Cotopaxi Bataan 3L Fanny Pack - Del Dia - Unisex
